channel.title: Client Compile/run problem
channel.description:
Basically, when I compile I get [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/38/88527543.png/][IMG]http://img38.imageshack.us/img38/7580/88527543.png[/img][/URL] Which is supposed to be a warning but still compiled fine. When I go to run the client, I get.. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/508/unledictp.png/][IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/5734/unledictp.png[/img][/URL] Yes the client was running fine before I compiled it. To compile I use,
@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.

item.title: Client Compile/run problem
item.dc:creator: @ImNoHacker ImNoHacker
item.description:
@ImNoHacker wrote:

Theres nothing wrong with your run.bat it’s something in the code of one of the .class’s thats fucked.

Tip: Use eclipse to code. It will automitically tell you whats wrong and most of the time, how to fix it.

Using eclipse could have saved you so much time.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Compile/run problem

item.description:

Basically, when I compile I get

Which is supposed to be a warning but still compiled fine. When I go to run the client, I get…
